Author: maverick2598
Text: Never heard that term before but very accurate. That’s a good way to look at it. Guess my competitive ED voice tends to make forget that part. Thank you for your perspective. I need to find a better crowd to be around.

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Relate. I’m so very done with the “pain olympics”.   Someone else struggling doesn’t magically lessen my struggle soooo, yeah. When people do this I try to remember it’s a sign they’ve got their own stuff/insecurities going on. But mostly I’ve tried to find different people - people who understand we’re all running our own race in our own time and that the valuable thing is to support each other and learn from each other <3
